full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### ATESS Trenton

**Reference Number:** cb-525-31570639
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-24-SC01
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-22T14:00:00

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Summary
The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to issue a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of engineering equipment maintenance services to support the Aerospace and Telecommunication Engineering Support Squadron (ATESS) Trenton at 8 Wing/Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.

#### Project Overview
The requirement is for the procurement of professional services to support the maintenance and operation of technical equipment for the ATESS Trenton. The estimated level of effort is 240 days per year, spread over a three-year contract term (2024-2027) with two additional irrevocable option years.

#### Requirements
The Hiring Authority requires the services of eight (8) Senior Technicians to support the maintenance and operation of technical equipment. The services will be provided in the following areas:

* Surveillance Radar Maintenance and Support Services (1 Senior Technician)
* Non-Directional Beacon (NDB) Maintenance and Support Services (1 Senior Technician)
* Instrument Landing Systems (ILS) Maintenance and Support Services (1 Senior Technician)
* AN/FYQ-CP5151 (V) Radar, Environmental & Data Display System (REDDS) Maintenance and Support (1 Senior Technician)
* Tactical Air Navigation System (TACAN) Maintenance and Support (2 Senior Technicians)
* VHF Park Air radios Maintenance and Support (2 Senior Radio Technicians)

#### Procurement Method
The procurement method is Competitive - Selective Tendering, which will involve the evaluation of proposals from pre-qualified suppliers. The solicitation is open to suppliers who have been pre-qualified under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price methodology.

#### Business Requirements
The successful bidder will be required to provide proof of relevant security clearances, including a Secret level clearance. The bidder will also be required to provide a bid bond in an amount equal to 10% of the total bid value.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Khan Check
khan.check2@forces.gc.ca
